GP12brndp1_u:1056: pravibhāgena bhūteṣu satyamātre sthiteṣu vā // BndP_1,7.3 //
GP12brndp1_u:1060: tatastu salile tasmin jñātvā tvantargato mahīm // BndP_1,7.5 //
GP12brndp1_u:1062: cakāra taṃ tu devo 'tha pūrvakalpādiṣu smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,7.6 //
GP12brndp1_u:1064: adbhiḥ saṃchāditāmicchan pṛthivīṃ sa prajāpatiḥ // BndP_1,7.7 //
GP12brndp1_u:1066: sāmudrāśca samudreṣu nādeyāśca nadīṣu ca // BndP_1,7.8 //
GP12brndp1_u:1068: prāksarge dahyamāne tu purā saṃvarta kāgninā // BndP_1,7.9 //
GP12brndp1_u:1070: śailyādekārṇave tasminvāyunā ye tu saṃhitāḥ // BndP_1,7.10 //
GP12brndp1_u:1075: saptasapta tu varṣāṇi tasyā dvīpeṣu saptasu /
GP12brndp1_u:1084: kalpasya cāsya brahmā cāsṛjadyaḥ sthāninaḥ surān // BndP_1,7.17 //
GP12brndp1_u:1086: svargaṃ diśaḥ samudrāṃśca nadīḥ sarvāṃstu parvatān // BndP_1,7.18 //
GP12brndp1_u:1092: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca tiṣyaṃ caiva tathā yugam // BndP_1,7.21 //
GP12brndp1_u:1094: prāguktāśca mayā tubhyaṃ pūrvve kalpe prajāstu tāḥ // BndP_1,7.22 //
GP12brndp1_u:1097: āvartante punaḥ sarge vīkṣārthaṃ tā bhavanti hi /
GP12brndp1_u:1098: vīkṣyārthaṃ tāḥ sthitāstatra punaḥ sargasya kāraṇāt // BndP_1,7.24 //
GP12brndp1_u:1100: dharmmārtha kāmamokṣāṇāmiha tāḥ sādhitāḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,7.25 //
GP12brndp1_u:1103: brāhmaṇo manavaste vai siddhātmāno bhavanti hi /
GP12brndp1_u:1104: āsaṃgadveṣayuktena karmaṇā te divaṃ gatāḥ // BndP_1,7.27 //
GP12brndp1_u:1108: apsu yaḥ kāraṇaṃ teṣāṃ bodhayankarmmaṇā tu saḥ // BndP_1,7.29 //
GP12brndp1_u:1110: gṛhṇanti te śarīrāṇi nānārūpāṇi yoniṣu // BndP_1,7.30 //
GP12brndp1_u:1112: teṣāṃ medhyāni karmmāṇi prāyaśaḥ pratipedire // BndP_1,7.31 //
GP12brndp1_u:1114: punaḥ punaste kalpeṣu jāyante nāmarūpeṇaḥ // BndP_1,7.32 //
GP12brndp1_u:1126: tataḥ prabhṛti kalpe 'sminmaithunānāṃ ca saṃbhavaḥ // BndP_1,7.38 //
GP12brndp1_u:1127: dhyānena manasā tāsāṃ prajānāṃ jāyate kṛte /
GP12brndp1_u:1130: tathānvayāstu saṃbhūtā yairidaṃ pūritaṃ jagat // BndP_1,7.40 //
GP12brndp1_u:1132: tadā tā hyalpasaṃtoṣāyuddhe tasmiṃścaraṃti vai // BndP_1,7.41 //
GP12brndp1_u:1133: pṛthvī rasavatī nāma āhāraṃ vyāharaṃti ca /
GP12brndp1_u:1134: tāḥ prajāḥ kāmacāriṇyo mānasīṃ siddhimicchataḥ // BndP_1,7.42 //
GP12brndp1_u:1136: dharmādharmauṃ tadā na staḥ kalpādau prathame yuge // BndP_1,7.43 //
GP12brndp1_u:1138: catvāri tu sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ divyasaṃkhyayā // BndP_1,7.44 //
GP12brndp1_u:1139: ādau kṛtayugaṃ prāhuḥ saṃdhyāṃśau ca catuḥśatau /
GP12brndp1_u:1141: na tāsāṃ pratighāto 'sti na dvaṃdvaṃ nāpi ca kramaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:1146: nodvijā notkaṭāścaiva dharmasya prakriyā tu sā // BndP_1,7.48 //
GP12brndp1_u:1150: uttiṣṭhaṃti pṛthivyāṃ vai teṣāṃ dhyānai rasātalāt // BndP_1,7.50 //
GP12brndp1_u:1154: samaṃ janma ca rūpaṃ ca prīyaṃte caiva tāḥ samāḥ // BndP_1,7.52 //
GP12brndp1_u:1155: tadā satyamalobhaśca saṃtuṣṭiśca ca sukhaṃ damaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:1162: sukhaprāyā viśokāśca utpadyaṃte kṛte yuge // BndP_1,7.56 //
GP12brndp1_u:1163: lābhālābhau na vā syātāṃ mitrāmitrau priyāpriyau /
GP12brndp1_u:1165: nāti hiṃsati vānyonyaṃ nānugṛṅṇaṃti vai tadā // BndP_1,7.58 //
GP12brndp1_u:1166: jñānaṃ paraṃ kṛtayuge tretāyāṃ yajña ucyate /
GP12brndp1_u:1167: pavṛttaṃ dvāpare yuddhaṃ steyameva kalau yuge // BndP_1,7.59 //
GP12brndp1_u:1168: sattvaṃ kṛtaṃ rajastretā dvāparaṃ tu rajastamaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:1169: kalistamastu vijñeyaṃ guṇavṛttaṃ gumeṣu tat // BndP_1,7.60 //
GP12brndp1_u:1170: kālaḥ kṛtayuge tveṣa tasya sandhyāṃ nibodhata /
GP12brndp1_u:1171: catvāri tu sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ tatkṛtaṃ yugam // BndP_1,7.61 //
GP12brndp1_u:1172: sādhyāṃśau tasya divyāni śatānyaṣṭau tu saṃkhyayā /
GP12brndp1_u:1173: catvāryaiva sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ monuṣāṇi tu // BndP_1,7.62 //
GP12brndp1_u:1175: tataḥ kṛtyuge tasmin sasaṃdhyāṃśe gate tadā // BndP_1,7.63 //
GP12brndp1_u:1177: sandhyāyāstu vyatītāyāḥ sāṃdhyaḥ kālo yugasya saḥ // BndP_1,7.64 //
GP12brndp1_u:1180: tasyāṃ ca sandhau naṣṭāyāṃ mānasī cābhavatprajā /
GP12brndp1_u:1182: sargādau yā mayāṣṭau tu mānasyo vai prakīrtitāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:1183: aṣṭau tāḥ kramayogena siddhayo yāṃti saṃkṣayam // BndP_1,7.67 //
GP12brndp1_u:1184: kalpādau mānasī hyekā siddhirbhavati sā kṛte /
GP12brndp1_u:1187: saṃdhyā kṛtasya pādena saṃkṣepeṇa vaśāttataḥ // BndP_1,7.69 //
GP12brndp1_u:1192: tasmin kṣīṇe kṛtāṃśe vai tāsu śiṣṭāsu saptasu /
GP12brndp1_u:1196: apāṃśau tau pratigatau tadā meghātmānā tu vai /
GP12brndp1_u:1199: prajā āsaṃstatastāsāṃ vṛkṣaśca gṛha saṃjñitāḥ // BndP_1,7.75 //
GP12brndp1_u:1205: tadā tadvai na bhavati punaryugabalena tu // BndP_1,7.78 //
GP12brndp1_u:1207: tatastenaiva yogena varttate maithunaṃ tadā // BndP_1,7.79 //
GP12brndp1_u:1210: viparyayeṇa teṣāṃ tu tena tatkāla bhāvitā /
GP12brndp1_u:1211: praṇaśyaṃti tataḥ sarve vṛkṣāste gṛhasaṃjñitāḥ // BndP_1,7.81 //
GP12brndp1_u:1215: vastrāṇi ca prasūyaṃte phalānyābharaṇāni ca // BndP_1,7.83 //
GP12brndp1_u:1217: ānvīkṣikaṃ mahāvīryaṃ puṭake puṭake madhu // BndP_1,7.84 //
GP12brndp1_u:1218: tena tā varttayanti smamukhe tretāyugasya vai /
GP12brndp1_u:1221: vṛkṣāṃstāḥ paryagṛhṇaṃta madhu vā mākṣikaṃ balāt // BndP_1,7.86 //
GP12brndp1_u:1223: pranaṣṭā prabhuṇā sārddhaṃ kalpavṛkṣāḥ kvacitkvacit // BndP_1,7.87 //
GP12brndp1_u:1225: varttaṃte cānayā tāsāṃ dvaṃdvānyatyutthitāni tu // BndP_1,7.88 //
GP12brndp1_u:1231: madhudhunvatsu niṣṭheṣu parvateṣu nadīṣu ca // BndP_1,7.91 //
GP12brndp1_u:1233: yathājoṣaṃ yathākāmaṃ sameṣu viṣameṣu ca // BndP_1,7.92 //
GP12brndp1_u:1235: tatastānnirmayāmāsuḥ kheṭāni ca purāṇi ca // BndP_1,7.93 //
GP12brndp1_u:1239: mānārthāni pramāṇāni tadā prabhṛti cakrire // BndP_1,7.95 //
GP12brndp1_u:1241: daśa tvaṃgulaparvāṇi prādeśa iti saṃjñitaḥ // BndP_1,7.96 //
GP12brndp1_u:1249: dhanuḥsahastre dve tatra gavyūtistauḥ kṛtā tadā // BndP_1,7.100 //
GP12brndp1_u:1253: caturtha kṛtimaṃ duga tasya vakṣyāmi nirṇayam // BndP_1,7.102 //
GP12brndp1_u:1257: hastasroto daśaśreṣṭho navahastoṣṭa eva ca // BndP_1,7.104 //
GP12brndp1_u:1258: kheṭānāṃ ca purāṇāṃ ca grāmāṇāṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:1264: vṛttaṃ vajraṃ ca dīrgha ca nagaraṃ na praśasyate /
GP12brndp1_u:1265: caturasrayutaṃ divyaṃ praśastaṃ taiḥ puraṃ kṛtam // BndP_1,7.108 //
GP12brndp1_u:1267: atra madhyaṃ praśaṃsaṃti hrasvaṃ kāṣṭhavivarjjitam // BndP_1,7.109 //
GP12brndp1_u:1271: dvikrośaḥ paramā sīmā kṣetrasīmā caturddhanuḥ // BndP_1,7.111 //
GP12brndp1_u:1272: viṃśaddhanūṃṣi vistīrṇo diśāṃ mārgastu taiḥ kṛtaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:1274: dhanūṃṣi daśa vistīrṇaḥ śrīmān rājapathaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:1281: kṛteṣu teṣu sthāneṣu punargehagṛhāṇi vai // BndP_1,7.116 //
GP12brndp1_u:1282: yathā te pūrvamāsaṃśca vṛkṣāstu gṛha saṃsthitāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:1283: tathā kartuṃ samārabdhāściṃtayitvā punaḥ punaḥ // BndP_1,7.117 //
GP12brndp1_u:1285: ata ūrddha gatāścānyā evaṃ tiryaggatāḥ parā // BndP_1,7.118 //
GP12brndp1_u:1287: yathā kṛtāstu taiḥ śākhāsta smācchālāstu tāḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,7.119 //
GP12brndp1_u:1288: evaṃ prasiddhāḥ śākhābhyaḥ śāloścaiva gṛhāṇi ca /
GP12brndp1_u:1289: tasmāttāśca smṛtāḥ śālāḥ śālātvaṃ tāsu tatsmṛtam // BndP_1,7.120 //
GP12brndp1_u:1291: tasmād gṛhāṇi śālāśca prāsādāścaiva saṃjñitā // BndP_1,7.121 //
GP12brndp1_u:1293: naṣṭeṣu madhunā sārddhaṃ kalpavṛkṣeṣu vai tadā // BndP_1,7.122 //
GP12brndp1_u:1295: tataḥ prādurbabhau tāsāṃ siddhistretāyuge tadā // BndP_1,7.123 //
GP12brndp1_u:1297: tāsāṃ vṛṣṭyudakānīha yāni miṣṭagatāni ca // BndP_1,7.124 //
GP12brndp1_u:1299: ye parastādapāṃ stokāḥ saṃpātāḥ puthivītale // BndP_1,7.125 //
GP12brndp1_u:1305: tadauṣadhena vartaṃte prajāstretā mukhe tadā // BndP_1,7.128 //
GP12brndp1_u:1310: siddhātmānastu ye pūrvaṃ vyākhyātā vaḥ kṛte mayā /
GP12brndp1_u:1311: brahmaṇo mānasāste vai utpannā ye janādiha // BndP_1,7.131 //
GP12brndp1_u:1313: tata āvarttamānāste tretāyāṃ jajñire punaḥ // BndP_1,7.132 //
GP12brndp1_u:1315: bhāvitāḥ pūrvajātīṣu khyātyā te śubhapāpayoḥ // BndP_1,7.133 //
GP12brndp1_u:1316: tataste prabalā ye tu satyaśīlā ahiṃsakāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:1317: vītalobhā jitātmāno nivasaṃti smṛteṣu vai // BndP_1,7.134 //
GP12brndp1_u:1319: teṣāṃ karmāṇi kurvaṃti tebhyaścaivābalāśca ye // BndP_1,7.135 //
GP12brndp1_u:1322: tena doṣeṇa vai śāṃtā oṣadhyo nitarāṃ tadā /
GP12brndp1_u:1323: pranaṣṭā gṛhyamāṇā vai muṣṭibhyāṃ sikatā yathā // BndP_1,7.137 //
GP12brndp1_u:1325: phalairgṛhṇaṃti puṣpaiśca tathā mūlaiśca tāḥ punaḥ // BndP_1,7.138 //
GP12brndp1_u:1327: kṣudhāviṣṭāstadā sarvā jagmustā vai svayambhuvam // BndP_1,7.139 //
GP12brndp1_u:1329: brahmā svayaṃbhūrbhagavān jñātvā tāsāṃ manīṣitam // BndP_1,7.140 //
GP12brndp1_u:1331: grastāḥ pṛthivyā tvoṣadhyo jñātvā pratyarūhatpunaḥ // BndP_1,7.141 //
GP12brndp1_u:1332: kṛtvā vatsaṃ sameruṃ tu dudoha pṛthivīmimām /
GP12brndp1_u:1333: dugdheyaṃ gaustadā tena bījāni vasudhātale // BndP_1,7.142 //
GP12brndp1_u:1334: jajñire tāni bījāni grāmāraṇyāstu tāḥ prabhuḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:1340: ityetā oṣadhīnāṃ tu grāmyāṇāṃ jātayaḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:1343: grāmāraṇyāḥ smṛtā hyetā oṣadhyastu caturdaśa // BndP_1,7.147 //
GP12brndp1_u:1348: pṛthvī dugdhā tu bījāni yāni pūrvaṃ svayaṃbhuvā /
GP12brndp1_u:1349: ṛtupuṣpaphalāstā vai oṣadhyo jajñire tviha // BndP_1,7.150 //
GP12brndp1_u:1350: yadā prasṛṣṭā oṣadhyo na prathaṃtīha yāḥ punaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:1351: tatastāsāṃ ca pṛttyarthai vārtopāyaṃ cakāra ha // BndP_1,7.151 //
GP12brndp1_u:1353: tataḥ prabhṛti cauṣadhyaḥ kṛṣṭapacyāstu jajñire // BndP_1,7.152 //
GP12brndp1_u:1359: satyaṃ būta yathābhūtaṃ dhruvaṃ vo brahmaṇāstu tāḥ // BndP_1,7.155 //
GP12brndp1_u:1361: krītāni nāśayaṃti sma pṛthivyāṃ te vyavasthitāḥ // BndP_1,7.156 //
GP12brndp1_u:1363: sevaṃtaśca dravaṃtaśca paricaryāsu ye ratāḥ // BndP_1,7.157 //
GP12brndp1_u:1365: teṣāṃ karmāṇi dharmāṃśca brahmā tu vyadadhātprabhuḥ // BndP_1,7.158 //
GP12brndp1_u:1366: saṃsthityāṃ tu kṛtāyāṃ hi yāturvarṇyasya tena vai /
GP12brndp1_u:1367: punaḥ prajāstu tā mohāddharmmaṃ taṃ nānvapālayan // BndP_1,7.159 //
GP12brndp1_u:1369: brahmā buddhā tu tatsarvaṃ yāthātathyena sa prabhuḥ // BndP_1,7.160 //
GP12brndp1_u:1373: pāśupālyaṃ ca vāṇijyaṃ kṛṣiṃ caiva viśāṃ dadau // BndP_1,7.162 //
GP12brndp1_u:1375: sāmānyāni ca karmāṇi brahmakṣatraviśāṃ punaḥ // BndP_1,7.163 //
GP12brndp1_u:1377: karmājīvaṃ tu vai dattvā teṣāmiha parasparam // BndP_1,7.164 //
GP12brndp1_u:1378: teṣāṃ lokāṃtare mūrdhni sthānāni vidadhe punaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:1379: prājāpatyaṃ dvijātīnāṃ smṛtaṃ sthānaṃ kriyāvatām // BndP_1,7.165 //
GP12brndp1_u:1384: saṃsthityāṃ sukṛtāyāṃ vai cāturvarṇyasya tasya tat /
GP12brndp1_u:1386: tataḥ sthiteṣu varṇeṣu sthāpayāmāsa hyāśramān // BndP_1,7.168 //
GP12brndp1_u:1392: nirddideśa tatasteṣāṃ brahmā dharmānprabhā ṣate // BndP_1,7.171 //
GP12brndp1_u:1395: trayāṇā māśramāṇāṃ ca vṛttiyonīti caiva hi /
GP12brndp1_u:1396: yathākramaṃ ca vakṣyāmi vrataiśca niyamaistathā // BndP_1,7.173 //
GP12brndp1_u:1399: ḍhaṃḍī ca mekhalī caiva adhaḥśāyī tathājinī /
GP12brndp1_u:1404: apramādo 'vyavāyaśca dayā bhūteṣu ca kṣamā // BndP_1,7.177 //
GP12brndp1_u:1405: śravaṇaṃ guruśuśrūṣā satyaṃ ca daśamaṃ smṛtam /
GP12brndp1_u:1406: daśalakṣaṇako hyeṣa dharmaḥ proktaḥ svayaṃbhūvā // BndP_1,7.178 //
GP12brndp1_u:1408: teṣāṃ sthānānyaśuṣmiṃ ca saṃsthitānā macaṣṭa saḥ // BndP_1,7.179 //
GP12brndp1_u:1410: smṛtaṃ teṣāṃ tu yat sthānaṃ tadeva guruvāsinām // BndP_1,7.180 //
GP12brndp1_u:1411: saptarṣīṇā tu yatsthānaṃ smṛtaṃ tadvai vanaukasām /
GP12brndp1_u:1416: paṃthānaḥ pitṛyānāstu samṛtāścatvāra eva te // BndP_1,7.183 //
GP12brndp1_u:1418: paṃthāno devayānā ye teṣāṃ dvāraṃ raṃviḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:1420: evaṃ varṇāśramāṇāṃ ca pravibhāge kṛte tadā /
GP12brndp1_u:1421: yadā prajā nā varddhaṃta varṇadharmasamāsikāḥ // BndP_1,7.185 //
GP12brndp1_u:1424: tasmistretāyuge tvādye madhyaṃ prāpte krameṇa tu /
GP12brndp1_u:1425: tato 'nyāṃ mānasīṃ so 'tha prajāḥ sraṣṭuṃ pracakrame // BndP_1,7.187 //
GP12brndp1_u:1429: yugānurūpā dharmeṇa yairimā varddhitāḥ prajāḥ // BndP_1,7.189 //
GP12brndp1_u:1431: abhidhyāya prajā brahmā nānāvīryāḥ svamānasīḥ // BndP_1,7.190 //
GP12brndp1_u:1432: pūrvoktā yā mayā tubhyaṃ janānīkaṃ samāśritāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:1442: āhārārthaṃ prajānāṃ vai vidātmāno vinirmame // BndP_1,7.195 //
GP12brndp1_u:1443: iti śrībrahmāṃḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṃgapāde lokajñāna varṇanaṃ nāma saptamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12brndp1_u:1453: tato 'sya jagha nātpūrvamasurā jajñira sutāḥ // BndP_1,8.4 //
GP12brndp1_u:1455: sṛṣṭā yayā surāstanvā tāṃ tanuṃ sa vyapohata // BndP_1,8.5 //
GP12brndp1_u:1461: tatastāṃ yuñja mānasya priyamāsītprabhoḥ kila // BndP_1,8.8 //
GP12brndp1_u:1463: yato 'sya dīvyato jātāstena devāḥ prakīrttitāḥ // BndP_1,8.9 //

GP12brndp1_u:1593: dhatte dharmaḥ prajāḥ sarvā mano jñānakaraṃ smṛtam /

GP12brndp1_u:2198: dvipadāṃ catuṣpadāṃ caiva pakṣiṇāṃ sarvatāmapi // BndP_1,13.24 //
GP12brndp1_u:2199: sthāvarāṇāṃ ca pañcānāṃ puṣpaṃ kālārttavaṃ smṛtam /
GP12brndp1_u:2200: ṛtutvamārtavatvaṃ ca pitṛtvaṃ ca prakīrttitam // BndP_1,13.25 //
GP12brndp1_u:2203: tasmādete hi pitara ārtavā iti naḥ śrutam /
GP12brndp1_u:2208: jajñe svadhāpitṛbhyastu dve kanye lokaviśrute // BndP_1,13.29 //
GP12brndp1_u:2209: menā ca dhāraṇī caiva yābhyāṃ dhatamidaṃ jagat /
GP12brndp1_u:2210: te ubhe brahmavādinyau yoginyau caiva te ubhe // BndP_1,13.30 //
GP12brndp1_u:2211: pitaraste nije kanye dharmārthaṃ pradaduḥ śubhe /
GP12brndp1_u:2212: agniṣvāttāstu ye proktāsteṣāṃ menā tu mānasī // BndP_1,13.31 //
GP12brndp1_u:2213: dhāraṇī mānasī caiva kanyā barhiṣadāṃ smṛtā /
GP12brndp1_u:2214: merostāṃ dhāraṇīṃ nāma patnyarthaṃ vā sṛjan ghubhām // BndP_1,13.32 //
GP12brndp1_u:2216: agniṣvāttāstu tāṃ menā patnī himavate daduḥ // BndP_1,13.33 //
GP12brndp1_u:2218: menā himavataḥ patnī mainākaṃ sā vyajāyata // BndP_1,13.34 //
GP12brndp1_u:2219: gaṅgāṃ saridvarāṃ caiva patnī yā lavaṇodadheḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2220: mainākasyā tmajaḥ kraucaḥ kraiñcadvīpo yataḥ smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,13.35 //
GP12brndp1_u:2222: mandaraṃ suṣuve putraṃ tisraḥ kanyāśca viśrutāḥ // BndP_1,13.36 //
GP12brndp1_u:2223: velāṃ ca niyatiṃ caiva tṛtīyāṃ cāyatiṃ viduḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2225: svāyaṃ bhuveṃ'tare pūrvaṃ yayorvai kīrttitāḥ prajāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2228: savarṇāyāṃ sutā jātā daśa prācīnabarhiṣaḥ // BndP_1,13.39 //
GP12brndp1_u:2230: teṣāṃ svāyaṃbhuvo dakṣaḥ putratvaṃ jagmi vānprabhuḥ // BndP_1,13.40 //
GP12brndp1_u:2233: utpannaḥ sa kathaṃ dakṣo hyabhiśāpādbhavasya tu /
GP12brndp1_u:2234: cākṣuṣasyāntare pūrvaṃ tannaḥ prabrūhi pṛcchatām // BndP_1,13.42 //
GP12brndp1_u:2238: dakṣasyāsansutā hyaṣṭau kanyā yāḥ kīrttitā mayā /
GP12brndp1_u:2239: svebhyo gṛhebhya ānāyya tāḥ pitābhyarcayadgṛhe // BndP_1,13.44 //
GP12brndp1_u:2241: tāsāṃ jyeṣṭhā satī nāma patnī yā tryaṃbakasya vai // BndP_1,13.45 //
GP12brndp1_u:2245: tato jñātvā satī sarvāḥ nyavasaṃstāḥ piturgṛhe // BndP_1,13.47 //
GP12brndp1_u:2247: tābhyo hīnāṃ pitā cakre satyāḥ pūjāmasaṃmatām // BndP_1,13.48 //
GP12brndp1_u:2249: yavīyasībhyo pyadhamāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā mama prabho // BndP_1,13.49 //
GP12brndp1_u:2251: ahaṃ jyeṣṭhā variṣṭhā ca tvaṃ māṃ satkartumarha si // BndP_1,13.50 //
GP12brndp1_u:2253: tvattaḥ śreṣṭhāvariṣṭhāśca pūjyā bālāḥ sutā mama // BndP_1,13.51 //
GP12brndp1_u:2254: tāsāṃ caiva tu bhartāra ste me bahumātāḥ sati /
GP12brndp1_u:2257: vasiṣṭho 'triḥ pulastyaśca hyaṅgirā pulahaḥ kratuḥ // BndP_1,13.53 //
GP12brndp1_u:2259: yasmānmāṃ sparddhate śarvaḥ sadā caivāvamanyate // BndP_1,13.54 //
GP12brndp1_u:2260: tena tvāṃ na vibhūṣomi pratikūlo hi me bhavaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2263: tathoktā pitaraṃ sā vai kruddhā devīdama bravīt // BndP_1,13.56 //
GP12brndp1_u:2277: dakṣasya ca ṛṣīṇāṃ ca cukopa bhagavānprabhuḥ // BndP_1,13.62 //
GP12brndp1_u:2281: asyāṃ kṣitau dhṛtā lokāḥ sarve tiṣṭhanti bhāsvarāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2282: tānahaṃ dhārayā mīha satataṃ ca tadājñayā // BndP_1,13.64 //
GP12brndp1_u:2283: cāturvarṇyaṃ hi devānāṃ te cāpyekatra bhuñjate /
GP12brndp1_u:2284: nāhaṃ taiḥ saha bhokṣaye vai tato dāsyanti te pṛthak // BndP_1,13.65 //
GP12brndp1_u:2286: praśastāścetarāḥ sarvāḥ svasutā bhartṛbhiḥ saha // BndP_1,13.66 //
GP12brndp1_u:2288: utpatsyante dvitīye vai mama yajña hyayonicāḥ // BndP_1,13.67 //
GP12brndp1_u:2289: hute vai brahmaṇā śukre cākṣuṣasyātare manoḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2292: prācīnabarhiṣaḥ pautraḥ putraścaiva prace tasām // BndP_1,13.69 //
GP12brndp1_u:2293: dakṣa eveha nāmnā tu māriṣāyāṃ janiṣyasi /
GP12brndp1_u:2294: kanyāyāṃ śākhināṃ tvaṃ vai prāpte vaivasvateṃ'tare // BndP_1,13.70 //
GP12brndp1_u:2296: dharmmayukte ca te kārye ekasmiṃstu durāsade // BndP_1,13.71 //
GP12brndp1_u:2300: tasmātsārddhaṃ surairyajñe na tvāṃ yakṣyanti vai dvijāḥ // BndP_1,13.72 //
GP12brndp1_u:2301: hutvā'hutiṃ tava krūra hyapaḥ sprakṣyanti karmasu /
GP12brndp1_u:2302: ihaiva vatsyasi tathā divaṃ hitvā yugakṣayāt // BndP_1,13.73 //
GP12brndp1_u:2303: tato devaiḥsa taiḥ sārddhaṃ nejyate pṛthasijyate /
GP12brndp1_u:2305: svāyaṃbhuvīṃ tanuṃ tyaktvā utpanno mānuṣeṣviha // BndP_1,13.75 //
GP12brndp1_u:2308: atha devī satī yā tu prāpte vaivasvateṃ'tare /
GP12brndp1_u:2309: menāyāṃ tāmumāṃ devīṃ janayāmāsa śailarāṭ // BndP_1,13.77 //
GP12brndp1_u:2311: sadā patnī bhavasyaiṣā na tayā mucyate bhavaḥ // BndP_1,13.78 //
GP12brndp1_u:2313: yathā nārāyaṇaṃ śrīśca maghavataṃ śacī yathā // BndP_1,13.79 //
GP12brndp1_u:2314: viṣṇuṃ kīrtī ruṣā mūryaṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ cāpyarundhatī /
GP12brndp1_u:2315: naitāstu vijahatyetān bhartṝn devyaḥ kadācana // BndP_1,13.80 //
GP12brndp1_u:2316: āvartamānāḥ kalpeṣu jāyante taiḥ punaḥ saha /
GP12brndp1_u:2317: evaṃ prācetaso dakṣo jajñe vai cākṣuṣeṃ'tare // BndP_1,13.81 //
GP12brndp1_u:2319: jajñe tadābhiśāpena dvitīya iti naḥ śrutam // BndP_1,13.82 //
GP12brndp1_u:2320: bhṛgavādayaśca ye sapta jajñire ca maharṣayaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2321: ādye tretāyuge pūrvaṃ manorvaivasvatasya ca // BndP_1,13.83 //
GP12brndp1_u:2327: khyātiṃ na muñcate jantustanna kāryaṃ vipaścitā // BndP_1,13.86 //
GP12brndp1_u:2329: yā dakṣamadhikṛtyeha tvayā pūrvaṃ pracauditā // BndP_1,13.87 //
GP12brndp1_u:2333: devāyāmā iti khyātāḥ pūrvaṃ ye yajñasūnavaḥ // BndP_1,13.89 //
GP12brndp1_u:2335: putrāḥ svāyaṃbhuvasyaite śaktā nāma tu mānasāḥ // BndP_1,13.90 //
GP12brndp1_u:2336: teṣāṃ yato gaṇā hyete devānāṃ tu trayaḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2343: turīya idrayukcaiva yukto grāvajitastu vai // BndP_1,13.94 //
GP12brndp1_u:2345: jaro vibhurvibhāvaśca sa ṛcīko 'tha durdihaḥ // BndP_1,13.95 //
GP12brndp1_u:2357: atīto vartamānena dṛṣṭo vaivasvate na saḥ // BndP_1,13.101 //
GP12brndp1_u:2360: bhṛgvaṃ girā marīciśca pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2363: jyotiṣmān dyutimānhavyaḥ savanaḥ sattra eva ca // BndP_1,13.104 //
GP12brndp1_u:2369: bahutvānnāmadheyānāṃ saṃkhyā teṣāṃ kutaḥ kule // BndP_1,13.107 //
GP12brndp1_u:2374: kasya yoniḥ kimādiśca kiṃ satattvaḥ kimātmakaḥ // BndP_1,13.109 //
GP12brndp1_u:2375: kimasya cakṣuḥ kā mūrtiḥ ke vā avayavāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2376: kiṃ nāmadheyaṃ ko 'syātmā eptattvaṃ brūhi tattvataḥ // BndP_1,13.110 //
GP12brndp1_u:2381: saṃvatsaraḥ satattvaśca nāma cāsya kalātmakaḥ // BndP_1,13.112 //
GP12brndp1_u:2383: pañcadhā pravibhaktāṃ tu kālāvasthāṃ nibodhata // BndP_1,13.113 //
GP12brndp1_u:2389: kraturagnistu yaḥ proktaḥ sa tu saṃvatsaro mataḥ // BndP_1,13.116 //
GP12brndp1_u:2392: sa iḍāvatsaraḥ somaḥ purāṇe niścayaṃ gataḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2396: sa rudro vatsara steṣāṃ vijñeyo nīlalohitaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2397: satattvaṃ tasya vakṣyami kīrtyamānaṃ nibodhata // BndP_1,13.120 //
GP12brndp1_u:2404: yoniḥ sa pravibhāgānāṃ divasānāṃ ca bhāskaraḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2438: devatvaṃ ca pitṛtvaṃ ca kālatvaṃ cāsya yatparam /
GP12brndp1_u:2440: yataḥ patiḥ sa bhagavān prajeśānāṃ prajāpatiḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2446: gāyatrī caiva triṣṭupca jagatī caiva yāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2447: tryaṃbakā nāmataḥ premṇā yonayastā vanaspateḥ // BndP_1,13.145 //
GP12brndp1_u:2449: trisādhanaḥ puroḍāśastrikapālaḥ sa vai smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,13.146 //
GP12brndp1_u:2451: ityetatpañcavarṣaṃ hi yugaṃ proktaṃ manīṣibhiḥ // BndP_1,13.147 //
GP12brndp1_u:2452: yaścaiṣa pañcadhātmā vai proktaḥ saṃvatsaro dvijaiḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2455: ityeṣa bahumāno vai prāṇinā jīvitāni ca /
GP12brndp1_u:2456: nadīvega ivāsaktaḥ kālo dhāvati saṃharan // BndP_1,13.149 //
GP12brndp1_u:2461: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde kālasadbhāvavarṇanaṃ nāma trayodaśoṃ'dhyāya
GP12brndp1_u:2469: vistareṇānupūrvyā ca kīrtya mānaṃ nibodhata // BndP_1,14.3 //
GP12brndp1_u:2471: yairiyaṃ pṛthivī sarvā saptadvīpā sapattanā // BndP_1,14.4 //
GP12brndp1_u:2477: kanyā sā tu mahābhāga kardamasya prajā pateḥ // BndP_1,14.7 //
GP12brndp1_u:2478: kanye dve daśa putrāśca samrāṭ kukṣiśca te śubhe /
GP12brndp1_u:2479: tayorvai bhrātaraḥ śūrāḥ prajāpatisamā daśa // BndP_1,14.8 //
GP12brndp1_u:2481: jyotiṣmān dyutimānhavyaḥ savanaḥ sabhra eva ca // BndP_1,14.9 //
GP12brndp1_u:2483: dvīpeṣu teṣu dharmeṇa dvīpāntāśca nibodhata // BndP_1,14.10 //
GP12brndp1_u:2489: śākadvīpeśvaraṃ cāpi havyaṃ cakre priyavrataḥ // BndP_1,14.13 //
GP12brndp1_u:2493: mahāvītaṃ smṛtaṃ varṣaṃ tasya nāmnā mahātmanaḥ // BndP_1,14.15 //
GP12brndp1_u:2496: jaladaṃ ca kumāraṃ ca sukumāraṃ maṇīvakam /
GP12brndp1_u:2499: kumārasya tu kaumāraṃ dvitīyaṃ parikīrtitam // BndP_1,14.18 //
GP12brndp1_u:2503: modakasyāpi modākaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ varṣaṃ prakīrttitam // BndP_1,14.20 //
GP12brndp1_u:2505: teṣāṃ tu nāmabhistāni sapta varṣāṇi tatra vai // BndP_1,14.21 //
GP12brndp1_u:2510: kuśalasya tu deśo 'bhūta kauśalo nāma viśrutaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2511: deśo manonugasyāpi mānonuge ite smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,14.24 //
GP12brndp1_u:2515: ete janapadāḥ sapta kraiñcadvīpe tu bhāsvarāḥ // BndP_1,14.26 //
GP12brndp1_u:2517: udbhijjo veṇumāṃścaiva vairatho lavaṇo dhṛtiḥ // BndP_1,14.27 //
GP12brndp1_u:2518: ṣaṣṭhaḥ prabhākaraścā pi saptamaḥ kapilaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2519: udbhijjaṃ prathamaṃ varṣaṃ dvitīyaṃ veṇumaṇḍalam // BndP_1,14.28 //
GP12brndp1_u:2520: tṛtīyaṃ vai rathākāraṃ caturthaṃ lavaṇaṃ smṛtam /
GP12brndp1_u:2521: pañcamaṃ dhṛtimadvarṣaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ varṣaṃ prabhākaram // BndP_1,14.29 //
GP12brndp1_u:2523: teṣāṃ deśāḥ kaśadvīpe tatsanāmāna eva ca // BndP_1,14.30 //
GP12brndp1_u:2525: śālmalasyeśvarāḥ sapta sutāste ca vapuṣmataḥ // BndP_1,14.31 //
GP12brndp1_u:2533: sapta medhātithe putrāḥ plakṣadvīpeśvarā nṛpāḥ // BndP_1,14.35 //
GP12brndp1_u:2534: jyeṣṭhaḥ śāntabhayo nāma dvitīyaḥ śiśiraḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2537: dhruvastu saptamo jñeyaḥ putrā medhātitheḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,14.37 //
GP12brndp1_u:2538: saptānāṃ nāmabhisteṣāṃ tāni varṣāṇi sapta vai /
GP12brndp1_u:2539: tasmācchāntabhayaṃ caiva śiśiraṃ ca sukhodayam // BndP_1,14.38 //
GP12brndp1_u:2540: ānandaṃ ca śivaṃ caiva kṣemakaṃ ca dhruvaṃ tathā /
GP12brndp1_u:2541: tāni teṣāṃ samānāni sapta varṣāṇi bhāgaśaḥ // BndP_1,14.39 //
GP12brndp1_u:2547: sukhamāyuśca rūpaṃ ca balaṃ dharmaśca nityaśaḥ // BndP_1,14.42 //
GP12brndp1_u:2555: ramyastu pañcamaḥ putro hiraṇvān ṣaṣṭha ucyate // BndP_1,14.46 //
GP12brndp1_u:2558: nābhestu dakṣiṇaṃ varṣaṃ himākhyaṃ tu pitā dadau /
GP12brndp1_u:2559: hemakūṭaṃ tu yadvarṣaṃ dadau kipuruṣāya tat // BndP_1,14.48 //
GP12brndp1_u:2560: naiṣadhaṃ yatsmṛtaṃ varṣaṃ harivarṣāya taṃ dadau /
GP12brndp1_u:2561: madhyamaṃ yatsumerostu dadau sa tadilāvṛtam // BndP_1,14.49 //
GP12brndp1_u:2562: nīlaṃ tu yatsmṛtaṃ varṣaṃ ramyāyaitaptitā dadau /
GP12brndp1_u:2563: śvetaṃ yaduttaraṃ tasmātpitrā dattaṃ hiraṇvate // BndP_1,14.50 //
GP12brndp1_u:2565: sālyavantaṃ tathā varṣaṃ bhadrāśvāya nyavedayat // BndP_1,14.51 //
GP12brndp1_u:2567: ityetāni mayoktāni nava varṣāṇi bhāgaśaḥ // BndP_1,14.52 //
GP12brndp1_u:2569: yathākramaṃ sa dharmātmā tatastu tapasi sthitaḥ // BndP_1,14.53 //
GP12brndp1_u:2570: ityetauḥ saptabhiḥ kṛtsnā saptadvīpā nive śitāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2571: priyavratasya putraistaiḥ pautaiḥ svāyaṃbhuvasya ca // BndP_1,14.54 //
GP12brndp1_u:2572: evaṃ varṣeṣu sarveṣu sanniveśāḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2573: kriyante pralaye vṛtte sapta saptasu pārthivaiḥ // BndP_1,14.55 //
GP12brndp1_u:2574: evaṃ svabhāvaḥ kalpānāṃ dvīpānāṃ ca niveśane /
GP12brndp1_u:2575: yāni kiṃpuruṣādyāni varṇāṇyaṣṭau śrutāni tu // BndP_1,14.56 //
GP12brndp1_u:2577: viparyayo na teṣvasti jarāmṛtyubhayaṃ na ca // BndP_1,14.57 //
GP12brndp1_u:2579: na teṣvasti yugāvasthā kṣetreṣvaṣṭāsu sarvaśaḥ // BndP_1,14.58 //
GP12brndp1_u:2585: himāhvaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ varṣaṃ bharatāya nyavedayat // BndP_1,14.61 //
GP12brndp1_u:2586: tasmāttu bhārataṃ varṣaṃ tasya nāmnā vidurbudhāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2589: putrasaṃkrāmitaśrīstu vanaṃ rājā viveśa saḥ // BndP_1,14.63 //
GP12brndp1_u:2593: pratīhāraḥ kulaṃ tasya nāmnā jajñe tadanvayaḥ // BndP_1,14.65 //
GP12brndp1_u:2595: unnetā pratihartustu bhūmā tasya sutaḥ smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,14.66 //
GP12brndp1_u:2597: prastāvestu vibhuḥ putraḥ pṛthustasya suto 'bhavat // BndP_1,14.67 //
GP12brndp1_u:2598: pṛthoścāpi suto nakto naktasyāpi gayaḥ sutaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2599: gayasyāpi naraḥ putro narasyāpi suto virāṭ // BndP_1,14.68 //
GP12brndp1_u:2604: tasya putraśataṃ tvāsīdrājānaḥ sarva eva tu /
GP12brndp1_u:2607: teṣāṃ vaṃśaprasūtaistu bhukteyaṃ bhāratī purā // BndP_1,14.72 //
GP12brndp1_u:2611: evaṃ svāyaṃ bhuvaḥ sargo yenedaṃ pūritaṃ jagat // BndP_1,14.74 //
GP12brndp1_u:2614: teṣāṃ sṛṣṭiriyaṃ proktā yugaiḥ saha vivarttate // BndP_1,14.75 //
GP12brndp1_u:2615: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde priyavratavaṃśānukīrttanaṃ nāma catudaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12brndp1_u:2619: papraccha niyataṃ sūtaṃ pṛthivyuda dhivistaram // BndP_1,15.1 //
GP12brndp1_u:2620: kati dvīpā samudrā vā pavatā vā kati smṛtāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2621: kiyanti caiva varṣāṇi teṣu nadyaśca kāḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,15.2 //
GP12brndp1_u:2622: mahā bhūtapramāṇaṃ ca lokālokaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12brndp1_u:2624: etatprabūhi naḥ sarvaṃ vistareṇa yathārthataḥ // BndP_1,15.3 //
GP12brndp1_u:2627: saṃkhyāṃ caiva samudrāṇāṃ dvīpānāṃ caiva vistaram /
GP12brndp1_u:2629: na śakyante krameṇeha vaktuṃ yaiḥ satataṃ jagat /
GP12brndp1_u:2632: acintyāḥ khalu ye bhāvā na tāṃstarkeṇa sādhayet // BndP_1,15.7 //
GP12brndp1_u:2644: jaṃbūdvīpasya vistārāt samena tu samantataḥ // BndP_1,15.13 //
GP12brndp1_u:2648: sarvarttuṣu sukhaścāpi niṣadhaḥ parvato mahān // BndP_1,15.15 //
GP12brndp1_u:2650: dvātriṃśacca sahasrāṇi vistīrṇaḥ sa ca mūrddhani // BndP_1,15.16 //
GP12brndp1_u:2654: pūrvatarḥ śvetavarṇaśca brāhmaṇastasya tena tat // BndP_1,15.18 //
GP12brndp1_u:2660: vṛttaḥ svabhāvataḥ prokto varṇataḥ parimāṇataḥ // BndP_1,15.21 //
GP12brndp1_u:2666: navaivaṃ tu sahasrāṇi vistīrṇaṃ sarvatastu tat // BndP_1,15.24 //
GP12brndp1_u:2669: varṣāṇi yāni ṣaṭ caiva teṣāṃ ye varṣaparvatāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2670: dve dve sahasre vistīrṇā yojanānāṃ samucchrayāt // BndP_1,15.26 //
GP12brndp1_u:2672: yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi śataṃ dvāvāyatau girī // BndP_1,15.27 //
GP12brndp1_u:2673: nīlaśca niṣadhaścaiva tābhyāṃ hīnāstu ye pare /
GP12brndp1_u:2675: navatī dve aśītī dve sahasrāṇyāyatāstu teḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2676: teṣāṃ madhye janapadāstāni varṇāṇi sapta vai // BndP_1,15.29 //
GP12brndp1_u:2680: idaṃ haimavataṃ varṣaṃ bhārataṃ nāma viśrutam // BndP_1,15.31 //
GP12brndp1_u:2681: hemakūṭaṃ paraṃ hyasmā nnānnā kiṃṣurupaṃ smṛtam /
GP12brndp1_u:2684: ilāvṛtātpiraṃ nīlaṃ samyakaṃ nāma viśrutam // BndP_1,15.33 //
GP12brndp1_u:2686: hiraṇmayātparaṃ caiva śṛṅgavattaḥ kuru smṛtam // BndP_1,15.34 //
GP12brndp1_u:2687: dhanuḥsaṃsthe tu vijñeye dve varṣe dakṣiṇottare /
GP12brndp1_u:2688: dīrghāṇi tatra catvāri madhyamaṃ tadilāvṛtam // BndP_1,15.35 //
GP12brndp1_u:2689: arvāk ca niṣadhasyātha vedyarddhaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ smṛtam /
GP12brndp1_u:2690: paraṃ nīlavato yacca vedyarddhaṃ tu taduttaram // BndP_1,15.36 //
GP12brndp1_u:2691: vedyarddhe dakṣiṇe trīṇi trīṇi varṣāṇi cottare /
GP12brndp1_u:2692: tayormadhye tu vijñeyo merurmadhya ilāvṛtam // BndP_1,15.37 //
GP12brndp1_u:2700: caturvaṇaḥ sa sauvarṇaḥ caturasraḥ samucchritaḥ // BndP_1,15.41 //
GP12brndp1_u:2716: sa tu meruḥ parivṛto bhuvanairbhūtabhāvanaiḥ // BndP_1,15.49 //
GP12brndp1_u:2724: tatra te śubhakarmāṇaḥ ketumālāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ // BndP_1,15.53 //
GP12brndp1_u:2725: tatra kālā narāḥ sarve mahāsattvā mahābalāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2728: īśvaro brahmaṇaḥ putraḥ kāmacārī manojavaḥ // BndP_1,15.55 //
GP12brndp1_u:2729: tasya pītvā phalarasaṃ jīvanti ca samāyutam /
GP12brndp1_u:2730: pārśve mālyavataścāpi pūrve 'pūrvā tu gaṇḍikā // BndP_1,15.56 //
GP12brndp1_u:2734: tatra te puruṣāḥ svetā mahotsāhā balānvitāḥ // BndP_1,15.58 //
GP12brndp1_u:2739: kālāmrasya rasaṃ pītvā sarve ca sthirayauvanāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2740: dakṣiṇena tu śvetasya nīlasyaivottareṇa ca // BndP_1,15.61 //
GP12brndp1_u:2741: varṣaṃ ramaṇakaṃ nāma jāyante tatra mānavāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2744: tatrāpi sumahānvṛkṣo nyagrodho rohito mahān // BndP_1,15.63 //
GP12brndp1_u:2745: tasyāpi te phalarasaṃ pibanto varttayanti vai /
GP12brndp1_u:2746: daśavarṣasahasrāṇi śatāni daśa pañca ca // BndP_1,15.64 //
GP12brndp1_u:2747: jīvanti te mahābhāgāḥ sadā tdṛṣṭā narottamāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2748: dakṣiṇe vai śṛṅgavataḥ śvetasyāpyuttareṇa ca // BndP_1,15.65 //
GP12brndp1_u:2749: varṣaṃ hairaṇvataṃ nāma yatra hairaṇvatī nadī /
GP12brndp1_u:2750: mahābalāḥ sutejaskā jāyante tatra mānavāḥ // BndP_1,15.66 //
GP12brndp1_u:2753: āyuḥ pramāṇaṃ jīvanti śatāni daśa pañca ca /
GP12brndp1_u:2755: tasya pītvā phalarasaṃ te jīvanti nirāmayāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2756: trīṇi śṛṅgavataḥ śṛṅgāṇyucchritāni mahānti ca // BndP_1,15.69 //
GP12brndp1_u:2759: uttare vai śṛṅgāvataḥ samudrasya ca dakṣiṇe /
GP12brndp1_u:2762: vastrāṇi ca prasūyante phaleṣvābharaṇāni ca // BndP_1,15.72 //
GP12brndp1_u:2766: ye kṣaranti sadā kṣīraṃ ṣaḍrasaṃ hyamṛtopamam // BndP_1,15.74 //
GP12brndp1_u:2772: teṣāṃ te kṣīriṇāṃ kṣīraṃ pibanti hyamṛto pamam // BndP_1,15.77 //
GP12brndp1_u:2773: mithunaṃ jāyate sadyaḥ samaṃ caiva vivarddhate /
GP12brndp1_u:2774: samaṃ śīlaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca priyatā caiva tatsamā // BndP_1,15.78 //
GP12brndp1_u:2778: jīvanti te mahāvīryā na cānyastrīniṣeviṇaḥ // BndP_1,15.80 //
GP12brndp1_u:2779: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvītīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde pṛthivyāyāmavistaro nāma pañcadaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12brndp1_u:2782: evameva nisargo vai varṣāṇāṃ bhārate śubhe /
GP12brndp1_u:2783: dṛṣṭaḥ paramatattvajñairbhūyaḥ kiṃ varṇayāmi vaḥ // BndP_1,16.1 //
GP12brndp1_u:2789: atra vo varṇayiṣyāmi varṣe 'smin bhārate prajāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2790: idaṃ tu madhyamaṃ citraṃ śubhāśubhaphalodayam // BndP_1,16.4 //
GP12brndp1_u:2792: varṣaṃ tadbhārataṃ nāma yatreyaṃ bhāratī prajā // BndP_1,16.5 //
GP12brndp1_u:2796: na khalvanyatra martyānāṃ bhūmau karma vidhīyate // BndP_1,16.7 //
GP12brndp1_u:2802: yojanānāṃ sahasre tu dvīpo 'yaṃ dakṣiṇottarāt // BndP_1,16.10 //
GP12brndp1_u:2806: pūrve kirātā hyasyānte paścime yavanāḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,16.12 //
GP12brndp1_u:2807: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyā madhye śūdrāśca bhāgaśaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2814: kṛtsnaṃ jayati yo hyenaṃ samrāḍityabhidhīyate // BndP_1,16.16 //
GP12brndp1_u:2815: ayaṃ lokastu vai samrāḍantarikṣaṃ virāṭ smṛtam /
GP12brndp1_u:2816: svarāḍasau smṛto laukaḥ punarvakṣyāmi vistarāt // BndP_1,16.17 //
GP12brndp1_u:2820: teṣāṃ sahasraścānye parva tāstu samīpagāḥ // BndP_1,16.19 //
GP12brndp1_u:2828: anye tebhyo 'parijñātā hrasvāḥ svalapopajī vinaḥ // BndP_1,16.23 //
GP12brndp1_u:2830: pīyante yairimā nadyo gaṅgā siṃdhu sarasvatī // BndP_1,16.24 //
GP12brndp1_u:2832: irāvatī vitastā ca vipāśā devikā kuhūḥ // BndP_1,16.25 //
GP12brndp1_u:2833: gomatī dhūtapāpā ca budbudā ca dṛṣadvatī /
GP12brndp1_u:2834: kauśakī tridivā caiva niṣṭhīvī geḍakī tathā // BndP_1,16.26 //
GP12brndp1_u:2836: vedasmṛtirvedavatī vṛtraghnī siṃdhu reva ca // BndP_1,16.27 //
GP12brndp1_u:2839: kṣiprā hyavanti ca tathā pāriyātrāśrayāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2840: śoṇo mahānadaścaiva narmmadā surasā kriyā // BndP_1,16.29 //
GP12brndp1_u:2841: mandākinī daśārṇā ca citrakūṭā tathaiva ca /
GP12brndp1_u:2842: tamasā pippalā śyenā karamodā piśācikā // BndP_1,16.30 //
GP12brndp1_u:2844: sanerujā śuktimatī maṅkutī tridivā kratuḥ // BndP_1,16.31 //
GP12brndp1_u:2846: tāpī payoṣṇī nirvindhyā sṛpā ca niṣadhā nadī // BndP_1,16.32 //
GP12brndp1_u:2847: veṇī vaitaraṇī caiva kṣiprā vālā kumudvatī /
GP12brndp1_u:2848: toyā caiva mahāgaurī durgā vānnaśilā tathā // BndP_1,16.33 //
GP12brndp1_u:2858: kṛpā palāśinī caiva śuktimatprabhavāḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,16.38 //
GP12brndp1_u:2859: tāstu nadyaḥ sarasvatyaḥ sarvā gaṅgāḥ samudragāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2860: viśvasya mātaraḥ sarvā jagatpāpaharāḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,16.39 //
GP12brndp1_u:2864: matsyāḥ kuśalyāḥ sauśalyāḥ kuntalāḥ kāśikośalāḥ // BndP_1,16.41 //
GP12brndp1_u:2868: pṛthivyāmapi kṛtsnāyāṃ sa pradeśo manoramaḥ // BndP_1,16.43 //
GP12brndp1_u:2869: tatra govardhanaṃ nāma puraṃ rāmeṇa nirmitam /
GP12brndp1_u:2870: rāmapriyātha svargīyā vṛkṣa divyāsta thauṣadhīḥ // BndP_1,16.44 //
GP12brndp1_u:2888: tataḥ plavaṅgavo jñeyā maladā malavartikāḥ // BndP_1,16.53 //
GP12brndp1_u:2904: nāsikāścaiva ye cānye ye caivāntaranarmadāḥ // BndP_1,16.61 //
GP12brndp1_u:2916: apaprāva raṇāścaiva ūrṇā darvāḥ sahūhukāḥ // BndP_1,16.67 //
GP12brndp1_u:2918: catvāri bhārate varṣe yugāni ṛṣayo 'bruvan // BndP_1,16.68 //
GP12brndp1_u:2919: kṛtaṃ tretāyugaṃ caiva dvāparaṃ tiṣyameva ca /
GP12brndp1_u:2925: yacca kiṃpuruṣaṃ varṣaṃ harivarṣaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12brndp1_u:2926: ācakṣva no yathātattvaṃ kīrttitaṃ bhārataṃ tvayā // BndP_1,17.1 //
GP12brndp1_u:2934: varṣe kiṃpuruṣe puṇye vṛkṣo madhuvahaḥ śubhaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2935: tasya kiṃpuruṣāḥ sarve 'piban hi rasamuttamam // BndP_1,17.5 //
GP12brndp1_u:2939: harivarṣe narāḥ sarve pibantīkṣurasaṃ śupham // BndP_1,17.7 //
GP12brndp1_u:2941: harivarṣe tu jīvanti sarve muditamānasāḥ // BndP_1,17.8 //
GP12brndp1_u:2942: na jarā bādhate tatra na mriyante ca te 'cirāt /
GP12brndp1_u:2943: madhyamaṃ yanmayā proktaṃ nāmnā varṣamilāvṛtam // BndP_1,17.9 //
GP12brndp1_u:2944: na tatra sūryastapati na tu jīryanti mānavāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2945: candrasūryai sanakṣatrau na prakāśāvilā vṛte // BndP_1,17.10 //
GP12brndp1_u:2952: āyuḥ pramāṇaṃ jīvanti ye tu varṣa ilāvṛte /
GP12brndp1_u:2963: teṣāṃ madhye mahāmeruḥ svaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ // BndP_1,17.19 //
GP12brndp1_u:2973: tasya nāmnā samā khyāto jambūdvīpo vanaspateḥ // BndP_1,17.24 //
GP12brndp1_u:2975: utsedho vṛkṣarājasya divaṃ spṛśati sarvataḥ // BndP_1,17.25 //
GP12brndp1_u:2979: tasyā jambvāḥ phalaraso nadī bhūtvā prasarppati // BndP_1,17.27 //
GP12brndp1_u:2981: taṃ pibanti sadā tdṛṣṭā jaṃbūrasamilāvṛte // BndP_1,17.28 //
GP12brndp1_u:2982: jaṃbūphalarase pīte na jarā bādhate tu tān /
GP12brndp1_u:2983: na kṣudhā na śramaścāpi na mṛtyurna ca tandri tam // BndP_1,17.29 //
GP12brndp1_u:2985: indragopakasaṃkāśaṃ jāyate bhāsvaraṃ tu tat // BndP_1,17.30 //
GP12brndp1_u:2987: skannaṃ bhavati tacchubhraṃ kanakaṃ devabhūṣaṇam // BndP_1,17.31 //
GP12brndp1_u:2988: teṣāṃ mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ ca dikṣu sarvāsu sarvaśaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2991: hemakūṭe tu gandharvā vijñeyāḥ sāpsarogaṇāḥ // BndP_1,17.33 //
GP12brndp1_u:2995: daityānāṃ dānavānāṃ car śvetaḥ parvata ucyate // BndP_1,17.35 //
GP12brndp1_u:2997: navasveteṣu varṣeṣu yathābhāgaṃ sthiteṣu vai // BndP_1,17.36 //
GP12brndp1_u:3000: na saṃkhyā parisaṃkhyātuṃ śraddheyā tu bubhūṣatām // BndP_1,17.37 //
GP12brndp1_u:3001: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde kiṃpuruṣādivarṣavarṇanaṃ nāma saptadaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12brndp1_u:3004: madhye himavataḥ pṛṣṭhe kailāso nāma parvataḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3013: candraprabho nāma giriḥ suśubhro ratnasannibhaḥ // BndP_1,18.5 //
GP12brndp1_u:3014: tasya pāde mahāddivyaṃ svacchodaṃ nāma tatsaraḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3017: tasmin girau nivasati maṇibhadraḥ sahānugaḥ // BndP_1,18.7 //
GP12brndp1_u:3019: puṇyā mandākinī caiva nadī svacchodakā ca yā // BndP_1,18.8 //
GP12brndp1_u:3022: manaḥ śilāmayaṃ divyaṃ citrāṅgaṃ parvataṃ prati /
GP12brndp1_u:3023: lohito hemaśṛṅgaśca giriḥ sūryaprabho mahān // BndP_1,18.10 //
GP12brndp1_u:3024: tasya pāde mahaddivyaṃ lohitaṃ nāma tatsaraḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3025: tasmātpuṇyaḥ prabhavati lauhityaḥ sa nado mahān // BndP_1,18.11 //
GP12brndp1_u:3026: devāraṇyaṃ viśokaṃ ca tasya tīre mahadvanam /
GP12brndp1_u:3027: tasmingirau nivasati yakṣo maṇidharo vaśī // BndP_1,18.12 //
GP12brndp1_u:3032: tasya pāde kalaḥ puṇyaṃ mānasaṃ siddhasevitam /
GP12brndp1_u:3034: tasyāstīre vana divyaṃ vaibhrājaṃ nāma viśrutam /
GP12brndp1_u:3043: muñjavāstu mahādivyo durgaḥ śailo himācitaḥ // BndP_1,18.20 //
GP12brndp1_u:3045: tasyā pādātprabhavati śailodaṃ nāma tatsaraḥ // BndP_1,18.21 //
GP12brndp1_u:3047: sā cakṣuḥ sītayormadhye praviṣṭā lavaṇodadhim // BndP_1,18.22 //
GP12brndp1_u:3048: tasyāstīre vanaṃ divyaṃ viśrutaṃ surabhīti vai /
GP12brndp1_u:3051: hiraṇyaśṛṅgaḥ sumahān divyo maṇimayo giriḥ // BndP_1,18.24 //
GP12brndp1_u:3053: ramyaṃ bindusaro nāma yatra rājā bhagīrathaḥ // BndP_1,18.25 //
GP12brndp1_u:3055: divaṃ yāsyanti te burve gaṅgatoyapariplutāḥ // BndP_1,18.26 //
GP12brndp1_u:3057: tatra tripayagā devī prathamaṃ tu pratiṣṭhitā /
GP12brndp1_u:3060: tatreṣṭvā tu gataḥ siddhiṃ śakraḥ sarvaiḥ suraiḥ saha // BndP_1,18.28 //
GP12brndp1_u:3062: dṛśyate bhāsvaro rātrau devī tripathagā tu sā // BndP_1,18.29 //
GP12brndp1_u:3065: tasyā ye bindavaḥ kecit kruddhāyāḥ patitā bhuvi /
GP12brndp1_u:3066: kṛtaṃ tu tairbidusarastato bindusaraḥ smṛtam // BndP_1,18.31 //
GP12brndp1_u:3067: tato nirūddhā sā devī bhavena smayatā kila /
GP12brndp1_u:3070: jñātvā tamyā abhiprāyaṃ krūraṃ devyāścikīrṣitam // BndP_1,18.33 //
GP12brndp1_u:3074: etasminneva kāle tu dṛṣṭvā rājānamagrataḥ // BndP_1,18.35 //
GP12brndp1_u:3076: anena toṣitaścāhaṃ nadyarthaṃ pūrvameva tu // BndP_1,18.36 //
GP12brndp1_u:3077: buddhāsya varadānaṃ ca kopaṃ niyatavāṃstu saḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3078: brahmaṇo vacanaṃ śrutvā dhāraya svarṇadīmiti // BndP_1,18.37 //
GP12brndp1_u:3082: tisraḥ ptācīmimukhaṃ pratīcīṃ tisra eva tu // BndP_1,18.39 //
GP12brndp1_u:3084: nalinī hlādinī caiva pāvanī caiva prācyagāḥ // BndP_1,18.40 //
GP12brndp1_u:3088: saptaitā bhāvayantīdaṃ himāhvaṃ varṣameva tu // BndP_1,18.42 //
GP12brndp1_u:3089: prasūtāḥ sapta nadyastāḥ śubhā bindu sarodbhavāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3091: upagacchanti tāḥ sarvā yato varṣati vāsavaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3094: kṛtvā tridhā siṃhavantaṃ sītāgātpaścimoda dhim // BndP_1,18.45 //
GP12brndp1_u:3098: daradāṃśca sakāśmīrān gāndharān raurasān kuhān // BndP_1,18.47 //
GP12brndp1_u:3115: tatastu pāvanī cāpi prācīmeva diśaṃ yayau /
GP12brndp1_u:3120: tatastu nalinī prāyāt prācīmāśāṃ javena tu // BndP_1,18.58 //
GP12brndp1_u:3122: pūrvandeśāṃśca sevantī bhittvā sā bahudhāgirīn // BndP_1,18.59 //
GP12brndp1_u:3127: upagacchanti tāḥ sarvā yato varṣati vāsavaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3128: vakvaukasāyāstīre tu vanaṃ surabhi viśrutam // BndP_1,18.62 //
GP12brndp1_u:3132: kuberānucarā hyete catvārastu samāḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,18.64 //
GP12brndp1_u:3138: saro viṣṇupadaṃ nāma niṣadhe parvatottame // BndP_1,18.67 //
GP12brndp1_u:3139: tasmāddvayaṃ prabhavati gāndharvī nākulī ca taiḥ /

GP12brndp1_u:3145: jyotsnā ca mṛgākāmā ca tasmāddve saṃbabhūvatuḥ /

GP12brndp1_u:3151: yāni kiṃpuruṣādyāni teṣu devo na varṣati /

GP12brndp1_u:3172: vasaṃti nānājātīni teṣu varṣeṣu tāni vai /
GP12brndp1_u:3173: ityeṣā dhārayantīdaṃ pṛthvī viśvaṃ jagatsthitam // BndP_1,18.84 //

GP12brndp1_u:3178: śṛṇutemaṃ yathātattvaṃ bruvato me dvijottamāḥ // BndP_1,19.1 //
GP12brndp1_u:3182: tatra puṇyā janapadāścirānna mriyate janaḥ // BndP_1,19.3 //
GP12brndp1_u:3183: kṛta eva ca durbhikṣaṃ jarāvyādhibhayaṃ kutaḥ /

GP12brndp1_u:3190: khyāyate yasya nāmnā tu varṣaṃ gomedasaṃjñitam // BndP_1,19.7 //
GP12brndp1_u:3196: chandamṛtyuḥ purā tasmindundubhiḥ sāditaḥ suraiḥ // BndP_1,19.10 //
GP12brndp1_u:3198: pañcamaḥ somako nāma devairyatrāmṛtaṃ purā // BndP_1,19.11 //
GP12brndp1_u:3200: ṣaṣṭastu sumanā nāma saptamarṣabha ucyate // BndP_1,19.12 //
GP12brndp1_u:3202: vaibhrājaḥ saptamastatra bhrājiṣṇuḥ sphāṭiko mahān // BndP_1,19.13 //
GP12brndp1_u:3204: teṣāṃ varṣāṇi vakṣyāmi nāmatastu yathākramam // BndP_1,19.14 //
GP12brndp1_u:3206: candrasya śiśiraṃ nāma nāradasya sukhodayam // BndP_1,19.15 //
GP12brndp1_u:3208: kṣemakaṃ vṛṣabhasyāpi vaibhrājasya dhruvaṃ tathā // BndP_1,19.16 //
GP12brndp1_u:3210: viharanti ramante ca dṛśyamānāśca taiḥ saha // BndP_1,19.17 //
GP12brndp1_u:3214: amṛtā sukṛtā caiva saptaitāḥ saritāṃ varāḥ // BndP_1,19.19 //
GP12brndp1_u:3216: bahūdakā hyoghavatyo yato varṣati vāsavaḥ // BndP_1,19.20 //
GP12brndp1_u:3217: tāḥ pibanti sadā hṛṣṭā nadījanapadāstu te /
GP12brndp1_u:3218: śubhāḥ śāntabhayāścaiva pramudaṃ śaiśirāḥ śivāḥ // BndP_1,19.21 //
GP12brndp1_u:3222: avasarpiṇī na teṣvasti tathaivotsarpiṇī na ca // BndP_1,19.23 //
GP12brndp1_u:3224: tretāyugasamaḥ kālaḥ sarvadā tatra varttate // BndP_1,19.24 //
GP12brndp1_u:3235: plakṣo nāma mahāvṛkṣastasya nāmnā sa ucyate /
GP12brndp1_u:3236: sa tatra pūjyate sthāne madhye janapadasya ha // BndP_1,19.30 //
GP12brndp1_u:3244: tatrāpi parvatāḥ sapta vijñeyā ratnayonayaḥ // BndP_1,19.34 //
GP12brndp1_u:3246: prathamaḥ sūryasaṃkāśaḥ kumudo nāma parvataḥ // BndP_1,19.35 //
GP12brndp1_u:3248: dvitīyaḥ parvataścātra hyuttamo nāma viśrutaḥ // BndP_1,19.36 //
GP12brndp1_u:3250: tṛtiyaḥ parvatastatra balāhaka iti śrutaḥ // BndP_1,19.37 //
GP12brndp1_u:3252: caturthaḥ parvato droṇo yatra sā vai sahoṣadhiḥ // BndP_1,19.38 //
GP12brndp1_u:3262: teṣāṃ varṣāṇi vakṣyāmi sarpaiva tu śubhāni vai // BndP_1,19.43 //
GP12brndp1_u:3264: balāhakasya jīmūtaṃ droṇasya haritaṃ smṛtam // BndP_1,19.44 //
GP12brndp1_u:3265: kaṅkasya vaidyutaṃ nāma mahiṣasya ca mānasam /
GP12brndp1_u:3266: kakudaḥ supradaṃ nāma saptaitāni tu saptadhā // BndP_1,19.45 //
GP12brndp1_u:3268: jyotiḥ śāntistathā tuṣṭā candrā śukrā vimocanī // BndP_1,19.46 //
GP12brndp1_u:3269: nivṛttiḥ saptamī tāsāṃ prativarṣaṃ tu tāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3272: ityeṣa saṃniveśo vaḥ śālmalasya prakīrttitaḥ // BndP_1,19.48 //
GP12brndp1_u:3276: vistarācchālmalasvaiva same na tu samantataḥ // BndP_1,19.50 //
GP12brndp1_u:3278: yathāśrutaṃ yathānyāyaṃ bruvato me nibodhata // BndP_1,19.51 //
GP12brndp1_u:3283: kuśadvīpe tu vijñeyaḥ parvato vidrumaśca yaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3288: mandā iti hyapā nāma mandaro dāraṇādayam // BndP_1,19.56 //
GP12brndp1_u:3290: udbhidaṃ prathamaṃ varṣaṃ dvitīyaṃ veṇumaṇḍalam // BndP_1,19.57 //
GP12brndp1_u:3291: tṛtīyaṃ vai rathākāraṃ caturthaṃ lavaṇaṃ samṛtam /
GP12brndp1_u:3292: pañcamaṃ dhṛtimadvarṣaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ varṣaṃ prabhākaram // BndP_1,19.58 //
GP12brndp1_u:3293: saptamaṃ kapilaṃ nāma sarve te varṣa bhāvakāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3296: na teṣu dasyavaḥ saṃti mleccha jātaya eva ca // BndP_1,19.60 //
GP12brndp1_u:3297: gauraprāyo janaḥ sarvaḥ kramācca mriyate tathā /
GP12brndp1_u:3298: tatrāpi nadyaḥ saptaiva dhūtapāpāśivā tathā // BndP_1,19.61 //
GP12brndp1_u:3301: abhigacchanti tāḥ sarvā yato varṣati vāsavaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3304: ityeṣa sanniveśo vaḥ kuśadvīpasya kīrttitaḥ // BndP_1,19.64 //
GP12brndp1_u:3306: kuśadvīpasya vistārāddviguṇaḥ sa tu vai smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,19.65 //
GP12brndp1_u:3308: tasmindvīpe nagaśreṣṭhaḥ kraiñcastu prathamo giriḥ // BndP_1,19.66 //
GP12brndp1_u:3314: ete ratnamayāḥ sapta kraiñcadvīpasya parvatāḥ // BndP_1,19.69 //
GP12brndp1_u:3318: kraiñcasya kuśalo deśo vāmanasya manonugaḥ // BndP_1,19.71 //
GP12brndp1_u:3324: tatrāpi nadyaḥ saptaiva prativarṣa smṛtāḥ śubhāḥ // BndP_1,19.74 //
GP12brndp1_u:3326: khyātiśca puṇḍarīkā ca gaṅgāḥ saptavidhāḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,19.75 //
GP12brndp1_u:3328: abhigacchanti tāḥ sarvā vipulāḥ subahūdakāḥ // BndP_1,19.76 //
GP12brndp1_u:3334: nisargo yaḥ prajānāṃ tu saṃhāro yaśca tāsu vai // BndP_1,19.79 //
GP12brndp1_u:3336: śṛṇudhvaṃ tu yathātathyaṃ bruvato me yathārthavat // BndP_1,19.80 //
GP12brndp1_u:3338: parivārya samudraṃ sa dadhimaṇḍodakaṃ sthitaḥ // BndP_1,19.81 //
GP12brndp1_u:3340: kuta eva ca durbhikṣaṃ jarāvyādhibhayaṃ kutaḥ // BndP_1,19.82 //
GP12brndp1_u:3342: ratnākarāstathā nadyasteṣāṃ nāmāni me śṛṇu // BndP_1,19.83 //
GP12brndp1_u:3344: prāgāyataḥ sa sauvarṇo hyudayo nāma parvataḥ // BndP_1,19.84 //
GP12brndp1_u:3345: vṛṣṭyarthaṃ jaladāstatra prabhaṃvati ca yānti ca /
GP12brndp1_u:3348: tato varṣaṃ prabhavati varṣākāle prajāsviha // BndP_1,19.86 //
GP12brndp1_u:3350: revatī divi nakṣatraṃ pitāmahakṛto vidhiḥ // BndP_1,19.87 //
GP12brndp1_u:3356: kesarī kesarayuto yato vāyuḥ prajāpatiḥ // BndP_1,19.90 //
GP12brndp1_u:3359: raivatasya tu kaumāraṃ śyāmasya ca maṇīvakam /
GP12brndp1_u:3360: astasyāpi śubhaṃ varṣaṃ vijñeyaṃ kusumottaram // BndP_1,19.92 //
GP12brndp1_u:3362: dvīpasya parimāṇaṃ tu hrasvadīrghatvameva ca // BndP_1,19.93 //
GP12brndp1_u:3364: śāko nāma mahotsedhastasya pūjyā mahānugāḥ // BndP_1,19.94 //
GP12brndp1_u:3367: sukumārī kumārī ca nalinī veṇukā ca yā /
GP12brndp1_u:3368: ikṣuśca veṇukā caiva gabhastiḥ saptamī tathā // BndP_1,19.96 //
GP12brndp1_u:3370: sahasraśaḥ samākhyātā yato varṣati vāsavaḥ // BndP_1,19.97 //
GP12brndp1_u:3371: na tāsāṃ nāmadheyāni parimāṇaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12brndp1_u:3372: śakyaṃ vai parisaṃkhyātuṃ puṇyāstāḥ sariduttamāḥ // BndP_1,19.98 //
GP12brndp1_u:3373: tāḥ pibanti sadā hṛṣṭā nadīrjanapadāstu te /
GP12brndp1_u:3382: varṇāśramasamākīrṇā deśāste sapta vai smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,19.103 //
GP12brndp1_u:3385: na teṣu lobho māyā vā hīrṣāsūyākṛtaḥ kutaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3386: viparyayo na teṣvasti kālātsvābhāvikaṃ param // BndP_1,19.105 //
GP12brndp1_u:3387: karāvāptirna teṣvasti na daṇḍo na ca daṇḍyakāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3388: svadharmeṇaiva dharma jñāste rakṣanti parasparam // BndP_1,19.106 //
GP12brndp1_u:3392: puṣkareṇa tu dvīpena vṛtaḥ kṣīrodako bahiḥ // BndP_1,19.108 //
GP12brndp1_u:3394: puṣkare parvataḥ śrīmāneka eva mahāśilaḥ // BndP_1,19.109 //
GP12brndp1_u:3396: dvīpasya tasya pūrvarddhe citrasānuḥ sthito mahān // BndP_1,19.110 //
GP12brndp1_u:3400: sthito velāsamīpe tu navacandra ivoditaḥ // BndP_1,19.112 //
GP12brndp1_u:3402: tāvadeva ca vistīrṇaḥ sarvataḥ parimaṇḍalaḥ // BndP_1,19.113 //
GP12brndp1_u:3404: eka eva mahāsāraḥ sanniveśo dvidhā kṛtaḥ // BndP_1,19.114 //
GP12brndp1_u:3407: tasmindvīpe smṛtau dvau tu puṇyau janapadau śubhau /
GP12brndp1_u:3408: abhito mānasasyātha parvatasya tu maṇḍale // BndP_1,19.116 //
GP12brndp1_u:3409: mahāvītaṃ tu yadvarṣa bāhyato mānasasya tat /
GP12brndp1_u:3414: adhamottamā na teṣvasti tulyāste rūpaśīlataḥ // BndP_1,19.119 //
GP12brndp1_u:3415: na tatra dasyurdamako nerṣyāsūyā bhayaṃ tathā /
GP12brndp1_u:3416: nigraho na ca daṇḍo 'sti na lobho na parigrahaḥ // BndP_1,19.120 //
GP12brndp1_u:3417: satyānṛtaṃ na tatrāsti dharmādharmauṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12brndp1_u:3418: varṇāśramau vā vārtā vā pāśupālyaṃ vaṇikpathaḥ // BndP_1,19.121 //
GP12brndp1_u:3419: trayī vidyā daṇḍanītiḥ śuśrūṣā śilpameva ca /
GP12brndp1_u:3421: na tatra varṣaṃ nadyo vā śītoṣṇaṃ vāpi vidyate /
GP12brndp1_u:3425: ityeṣa dhātakīkhaṇḍe mahā vīte tathaiva ca /
GP12brndp1_u:3432: apāṃ caiva samudrekātsāmudra iti saṃjñitaḥ // BndP_1,19.128 //
GP12brndp1_u:3434: tasmādvarṣamiti proktaṃ prajānāṃ sukhadaṃ yataḥ // BndP_1,19.129 //
GP12brndp1_u:3436: ratiprabadhanātmiddhaṃ varṣaṃ tatteṣu tena vai // BndP_1,19.130 //
GP12brndp1_u:3442: mahodadhigataṃ toyaṃ svata udricyate tathā // BndP_1,19.133 //
GP12brndp1_u:3446: daśottarāṇi pañcaiva hyaṅgulāni śatāni ca // BndP_1,19.135 //
GP12brndp1_u:3447: apāṃ vṛddhiḥ kṣayo dṛṣṭaḥ sāmudrīṇāṃ tu parvasu /
GP12brndp1_u:3450: aparvāṇastu girayaḥ parvabhiḥ parvatāḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,19.137 //
GP12brndp1_u:3452: śālmaliḥ śālmale dvīpe pūjyate sumahāvrataiḥ // BndP_1,19.138 //
GP12brndp1_u:3454: kraiñcadvīpe giriḥ kaiñco madhye janapadasya ha // BndP_1,19.139 //
GP12brndp1_u:3455: śākadvīpe drumaḥ śākastasya nāmnā sa ucyate /
GP12brndp1_u:3456: nyagrodhaḥ puṣkaradvīpe tatratyaiḥ sa namaskṛtaḥ // BndP_1,19.140 //
GP12brndp1_u:3458: tasminni vasati brahmā sādhyaiḥ sārddhaṃ prajāpatiḥ // BndP_1,19.141 //
GP12brndp1_u:3460: sa tatra pūjyate caiva deverdevotamotamaḥ // BndP_1,19.142 //
GP12brndp1_u:3462: dvīpeṣu teṣu sarveṣu prajānāṃ kramatastu vai // BndP_1,19.143 //
GP12brndp1_u:3463: sarvaśo brahmavaryeṇa satyena ca damena ca /
GP12brndp1_u:3468: sa viṣṇoḥ sacivo devaḥ sa pitā sa pitāmahaḥ // BndP_1,19.146 //
GP12brndp1_u:3470: ṣaḍrasaṃ sumahāvīryaṃ bhuñjate tu prajāḥ sadā // BndP_1,19.147 //
GP12brndp1_u:3478: yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi daśa tasyocchrayaḥ samṛtaḥ // BndP_1,19.151 //
GP12brndp1_u:3482: lokavistāramātraṃ tu hyalokaḥ sarvato bahiḥ // BndP_1,19.153 //
GP12brndp1_u:3488: etāvāneva vijñeyo lokāntaścaiva yaḥ paraḥ // BndP_1,19.156 //
GP12brndp1_u:3498: bāhyato ghanato yasya tiryagūrddhvaṃ tu maṇḍalam // BndP_1,19.161 //
GP12brndp1_u:3502: ghanavātaṃ tathākāśo dadhānaḥ khalu tiṣṭhati // BndP_1,19.163 //
GP12brndp1_u:3504: mahāśca so 'pyanantena hyavyaktena tu dhāryate // BndP_1,19.164 //
GP12brndp1_u:3514: mahato devadevasya maryādā yā vyavasthitāḥ // BndP_1,19.169 //
GP12brndp1_u:3516: te lokā ityabhihitā jagatasca na saṃśayaḥ // BndP_1,19.170 //
GP12brndp1_u:3522: vicitrā jagataḥ sā vai prakṛtirbrahmaṇaḥ sthitā // BndP_1,19.173 //
GP12brndp1_u:3526: mānasasya tu dehasya anantasya dvijottamāḥ // BndP_1,19.175 //
GP12brndp1_u:3527: kṣayo vā pariṇāmo vā anto vāpi na vidyate /
GP12brndp1_u:3528: ananta eṣa sarvatra evaṃ jñāneṣu paṭhyate // BndP_1,19.176 //
GP12brndp1_u:3530: yaḥ padmanābhanāmnā tu tatkārtsnyena ca kīrttitaḥ // BndP_1,19.177 //
GP12brndp1_u:3531: sa eva sarvatra gataḥ sarvasthāneṣu pūjyate /
GP12brndp1_u:3532: bhūmau rasātale caiva ākāśe pavane 'nale // BndP_1,19.178 //
GP12brndp1_u:3533: arṇaveṣu ca sarveṣu divi caiva na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3534: tathā tamasi vijñeya eṣa eva mahādyutiḥ // BndP_1,19.179 //
GP12brndp1_u:3536: sarvalokeṣu lokeśa ijyate bahudhā prabhuḥ // BndP_1,19.180 //
GP12brndp1_u:3546: bhūtebhyaḥ paratastebhyo vyālokā sā dharā smṛtā // BndP_1,19.185 //
GP12brndp1_u:3548: pātre mahati pātrāṇi yathaivāntargatāni tu // BndP_1,19.186 //
GP12brndp1_u:3550: tathā hyāloka ākāśe bhedāstvantargatā matāḥ // BndP_1,19.187 //
GP12brndp1_u:3554: pratyā khyāya tu bhūtāni kāryotparttina vidyate // BndP_1,19.189 //
GP12brndp1_u:3557: ityeṣa saṃniveśo vai mayā prokto vibhāgaśaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3564: etāvadeva śrotavyaṃ saṃniveśe tu pārtheve // BndP_1,19.194 //
GP12brndp1_u:3570: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi kṛthivyā vai vicakṣaṇāḥ // BndP_1,19.197 //
GP12brndp1_u:3571: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde plakṣādidvīpavarṇanaṃ nāmaikonaviṃśatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12brndp1_u:3589: evaṃ matamanantasya bhautikasya na vidyate // BndP_1,20.8 //
GP12brndp1_u:3591: bhūmirjalamathā kāśamiti yā yā paraṃparā // BndP_1,20.9 //
GP12brndp1_u:3595: prathamaṃ tatvalaṃ nāma sutalaṃ tu tataḥ param // BndP_1,20.11 //
GP12brndp1_u:3597: tator'vākca talaṃ nāma parataśca rasātalam // BndP_1,20.12 //
GP12brndp1_u:3602: ṣaṣṭhaḥ śilāmayo jñeyaḥ sauvarṇaḥ saptamaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3605: puraṃ ca śaṅkukarṇasya kabandhasya ca mandiram // BndP_1,20.16 //
GP12brndp1_u:3607: rākṣasasya ca bhīmasya śūladantasya cālayam // BndP_1,20.17 //
GP12brndp1_u:3609: dhanañjayasya ca puraṃ nāgendrasya mahātmanaḥ // BndP_1,20.18 //
GP12brndp1_u:3610: kāliyasya ca nāgasya nagaraṃ kauśikasya ca /
GP12brndp1_u:3612: tale jñeyāni prathame kṛṣṇabhaume na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3613: dvitīye sutale viprā daityendrasya ca rakṣasaḥ // BndP_1,20.20 //
GP12brndp1_u:3614: mahājaṃbhasya tu tathā nagaraṃ prathamasya tu /

GP12brndp1_u:5630: laukikenaiva mānena hṛbdo yo mānuṣaḥ smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,29.12 //
GP12brndp1_u:5632: divye rātryahanī varṣa pravibhāgastayoḥ punaḥ // BndP_1,29.13 //

GP12brndp1_u:5635: triṃśadyāni tu varṣāṇi dipyo māsastu sa smṛtaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:5636: yanmānuṣaṃ śataṃ viddhi divyā māsāstrayastu te // BndP_1,29.15 //
GP12brndp1_u:5637: daśa caiva tathāhāni divyo hyeṣa vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:5639: divyaḥ saṃvatsaro hyeṣa mānuṣeṇa prakīrttitaḥ // BndP_1,29.16 //
GP12brndp1_u:5642: nava yāni sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ mānuṣāṇi tu /
GP12brndp1_u:5643: anyāni navatiścaiva dhruvaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,29.18 //
GP12brndp1_u:5645: varṣāṇāṃ tu śataṃ jñeyaṃ divyo hyeṣa vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,29.19 //

GP12brndp1_u:5652: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca kaliśceti catuṣṭayam // BndP_1,29.23 //

GP12brndp1_u:5655: catvāryāhuḥ sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ ca kṛta yugam /
GP12brndp1_u:5656: tasya tāvacchatī saṃdhyā saṃdhyāṃśaḥ saṃdhyāyā samaḥ // BndP_1,29.25 //
GP12brndp1_u:5658: ekanyāyena vartante sahasrāṇi śatāni ca // BndP_1,29.26 //
GP12brndp1_u:5659: trīṇi dve ca sahasrāṇi tretādvāparayoḥ kramāt /

GP12brndp1_u:5662: tasyaikaśatikā saṃdhyā saṃdhyāṃśaḥ saṃdhyayā samaḥ // BndP_1,29.28 //
GP12brndp1_u:5664: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca kaliścaiva catuṣṭayam // BndP_1,29.29 //
GP12brndp1_u:5666: kṛtasya tāvadvakṣyāmi varṣāṇi ca nibodhata // BndP_1,29.30 //
GP12brndp1_u:5672: viṃśatiśca sahasrāmi kālaḥ sa dvāparasya ca // BndP_1,29.33 //
GP12brndp1_u:5674: ṣaṣṭiścaiva sahasrāṇi kālaḥ kaliyugasya tu // BndP_1,29.34 //
GP12brndp1_u:5675: evaṃ caturyuge kāla ṛtaiḥ saṃdhyāṃśakaiḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:5684: viśatiśca sahasrāṇi kālo 'yaṃ sādhikaṃ vinā // BndP_1,29.39 //
GP12brndp1_u:5686: manvantarasya kālo 'yaṃ yugaiḥ sārddhaṃ ca kīrttitaḥ // BndP_1,29.40 //
GP12brndp1_u:5687: catuḥ sāhasrayuktaṃ vai prākṛtaṃ tatkṛtaṃ yugam /
GP12brndp1_u:5688: tretāśiṣṭaṃ pravakṣyāmi dvāparaṃ kalimeva ca // BndP_1,29.41 //
GP12brndp1_u:5690: kramāgataṃ mayā hyetattubhyaṃ nokta yuga dvayam // BndP_1,29.42 //
GP12brndp1_u:5692: atra tretāyugasyādau manuḥ saptarṣayaśca ye // BndP_1,29.43 //

GP12brndp1_u:5698: satyena brahmacaryeṇa śrutena tapasā ca vai // BndP_1,29.46 //

GP12brndp1_u:5706: te mantrā vai punasteṣāṃ pratibhāyāmupasthitāḥ // BndP_1,29.50 //

GP12brndp1_u:5755: cakraṃ ratho maṇiḥ khaḍgaścarmaratnaṃ ca pañcamam /

GP12brndp1_u:5768: artho dharmaśca kāmaśca yaśo vijaya eva ca // BndP_1,29.81 //
GP12brndp1_u:5770: śrutena tapasā caiva munīnabhibhavanti vai // BndP_1,29.82 //

GP12brndp1_u:5792: iti śrī brahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde saṃkhyāvartto nāmaikonatriśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ

GP12brndp1_u:7496: yathā vispandamānaṃ me kṣīraṃ sarvatra bhāvayet // BndP_1,36.194 //
GP12brndp1_u:7499: dhanuṣkoṭyā tathā vainyastena śailā vivarddhitāḥ // BndP_1,36.195 //
GP12brndp1_u:7501: svabhāvenā bhavattasyāḥ samāni viṣamāṇi ca // BndP_1,36.196 //
GP12brndp1_u:7502: na hi pūrvanisarge vai viṣame pṛthivītale /
GP12brndp1_u:7503: pravibhāgaḥ purāṇāṃ vā grāmāṇāṃ vāpi vidyate // BndP_1,36.197 //
GP12brndp1_u:7504: na sasyāni na gorakṣaṃ na kṛṣirna vaṇikpathaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7507: samatvaṃ yatra yatrāsīdbhūmeḥ kasmiṃścideva hi // BndP_1,36.199 //
GP12brndp1_u:7508: tatra tatra prajāstā vai nivasaṃti ca sarvaśaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7509: āhāraḥ phala mūle tu prajānāmabhavatkila // BndP_1,36.200 //
GP12brndp1_u:7512: sa kalpayitvā vatsaṃ tu cākṣuṣaṃ manumīśvaraḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7513: pṛthurdudoha sasyāni sve tale pṛthivīṃ tataḥ // BndP_1,36.202 //
GP12brndp1_u:7514: tenānnena tatastā vai varttayanti śubhāḥ prajāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7515: ṛṣibhiḥ śrūyate cāpi punardugdhā vasuṃdharā // BndP_1,36.203 //
GP12brndp1_u:7518: kṣīramāsīttadā teṣāṃ tapo brahma ca śāśvatam /
GP12brndp1_u:7521: vatsastu maghavānāsīddogdhā ca savitā vibhuḥ // BndP_1,36.206 //
GP12brndp1_u:7522: kṣīramūrjaṃ ca madhu ca varttante tena devatāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7523: pitṛbhiḥ śrūyate cāpi punardugdhā vasundharā // BndP_1,36.207 //
GP12brndp1_u:7527: asuraiḥ śrūyate cāpi punardugdhā vasundharā // BndP_1,36.209 //
GP12brndp1_u:7531: pāyasā te ca māyābhiḥ sarve māyāvino 'surāḥ // BndP_1,36.211 //
GP12brndp1_u:7533: nāgaistu śrūyate dugdhā vatsaṃ kṛtvā tu takṣakam // BndP_1,36.212 //
GP12brndp1_u:7535: teṣāṃ vai vāsukirdegdhā kādraveyaḥ pratāpavān // BndP_1,36.213 //
GP12brndp1_u:7536: nāgānāṃ vai dvijaśreṣṭha sarpāṇāṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7541: dogdhā rajatanābhastu pitā maṇidharasya yaḥ // BndP_1,36.216 //
GP12brndp1_u:7543: tena te varttayantīti paramarthatayā ca ha // BndP_1,36.217 //
GP12brndp1_u:7545: brahmā brāhyāstu vai dogadhā teṣāmāsītkuberakaḥ // BndP_1,36.218 //
GP12brndp1_u:7547: kapālapātre nirdugdhā hyantarddhanaṃ ca rākṣasaiḥ // BndP_1,36.219 //
GP12brndp1_u:7551: teṣāṃ vasurucistvāsīddogdhā putro muneḥ śubhaḥ // BndP_1,36.221 //
GP12brndp1_u:7553: śailaiśca śrūyate dugdhā punardevī vasundharā // BndP_1,36.222 //
GP12brndp1_u:7559: kāmadhuk puṣpitaḥ śālaḥ plakṣo vatso yaśasvinām // BndP_1,36.225 //
GP12brndp1_u:7561: saiva dhātrī vidhātrī ca dhāraṇī ca vasundharā // BndP_1,36.226 //
GP12brndp1_u:7562: dugdhā hitārthaṃ lokānāṃ pṛthuneti hi naḥ śrutam /
GP12brndp1_u:7563: carācarasya lokasya pratiṣṭhā yonireva ca // BndP_1,36.227 //
GP12brndp1_u:7564: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅga pāde śeṣamanvantarāśyānaṃ pṛthivīdohanaṃ ca nāma ṣaṭtriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12brndp1_u:7568: vasu dhatte yatastasmādvasudhā seti gīyate // BndP_1,37.1 //
GP12brndp1_u:7582: yodhairapi ca saṃgrāme prāptukāmairjayaṃ yudhi // BndP_1,37.8 //
GP12brndp1_u:7584: yo hi yoddhā raṇaṃ yāti kīrttayitvā pṛthuṃ nṛpam // BndP_1,37.9 //
GP12brndp1_u:7588: ete vatsaviśeṣāśca dogdhāraḥ kṣīrameva ca // BndP_1,37.11 //
GP12brndp1_u:7590: brahmaṇā prathamaṃ dugdhā purā pṛthvī mahātmanā // BndP_1,37.12 //
GP12brndp1_u:7591: vāyuṃ kṛtvā tathā vatsaṃ bījāni vasudhātale /
GP12brndp1_u:7592: tataḥ svāyaṃbhuve pūrvaṃ tadā manvantare punaḥ // BndP_1,37.13 //
GP12brndp1_u:7593: vatsaṃ svāyaṃbhuvaṃ kṛtvā sarvasasyāni caiva hi /
GP12brndp1_u:7594: tataḥ svārociṣe vāpi prāpte manvantare 'dhunā // BndP_1,37.14 //
GP12brndp1_u:7595: vatsaṃ svārociṣaṃ kṛtvā dugdhā sasyāni medinī /
GP12brndp1_u:7596: uttamena tu tenāpi dugdhā devānu jena tu // BndP_1,37.15 //
GP12brndp1_u:7598: punaśca pañcame pṛthvī tāmasasyāntare manoḥ // BndP_1,37.16 //
GP12brndp1_u:7599: dugdheyaṃ tāmasaṃ vatsaṃ kṛtvā vai balabandhunā /
GP12brndp1_u:7600: cāriṣṭavasya vai ṣaṣṭhe saṃprāpte cāntare manoḥ // BndP_1,37.17 //
GP12brndp1_u:7601: dugdhā mahī purāṇena vatsaṃ cāriṣṭavaṃ prati /
GP12brndp1_u:7602: cākṣuṣe cāpi saṃprāpte tadā manvantare punaḥ // BndP_1,37.18 //
GP12brndp1_u:7603: dugdhā mahī purāṇena vatsaṃ kṛtvā tu cākṣuṣam /
GP12brndp1_u:7605: vainyeneyaṃ purā dugdhā yathā te kathitaṃ mayā /
GP12brndp1_u:7606: etairdugdhā purā pṛthvī vyatīteṣvantareṣu vai // BndP_1,37.20 //
GP12brndp1_u:7609: devā manvantare svasthāḥ pṛthostu śṛṇuta prajāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7617: samudratanayāyāṃ tu kṛtadāraḥ sa vai prabhuḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7628: tadupaśrutya tapasā sarve yuktāḥ pracetasaḥ // BndP_1,37.31 //
GP12brndp1_u:7638: bhaviṣyajjanatā hyeṣā dhṛtā garbheṇa vai mayā // BndP_1,37.36 //
GP12brndp1_u:7640: bhāryā bhavatu vo hyeṣā somagarbhā vivarddhitā // BndP_1,37.37 //
GP12brndp1_u:7646: saṃtdṛtya kopaṃ vṛkṣebhyaḥ patnīṃ dharmeṇa māriṣām // BndP_1,37.40 //
GP12brndp1_u:7650: asṛjanmanasā tvādau prajā dakṣo 'tha maithunāt // BndP_1,37.42 //
GP12brndp1_u:7652: visṛjya manasā dakṣaḥ paścādasṛjata striyaḥ // BndP_1,37.43 //
GP12brndp1_u:7653: dadau sa daśa dharmāya kaśyapāya trayāṃ daśa /
GP12brndp1_u:7656: dve caiva bahuputrāya dve caivāṅgirase tathā // BndP_1,37.45 //
GP12brndp1_u:7658: antaraṃ cākṣuṣasyātha manoḥ ṣaṣṭhaṃ tu gīyate // BndP_1,37.46 //
GP12brndp1_u:7660: vasudevāḥ khagā gāvo nāgā ditijadānavāḥ // BndP_1,37.47 //
GP12brndp1_u:7665: devānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca devarṣiṇāṃ ca te śubhaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7666: saṃbhavaḥ kathitaḥ pūrvaṃ dakṣasya ca mahātmanaḥ // BndP_1,37.49 //
GP12brndp1_u:7668: kathaṃ prāce tastvaṃ ca punarlebhe mahātapāḥ // BndP_1,37.50 //
GP12brndp1_u:7669: etaṃ naḥ saṃśayaṃ sūta vyākhyātuṃ tvamihārhasi /
GP12brndp1_u:7670: dauhitraścaiva somasya kathaṃ śrvaśuratāṃ gataḥ // BndP_1,37.51 //
GP12brndp1_u:7673: ṛṣayo 'tra na suhyanti vidyāvantaśca ye janāḥ // BndP_1,37.52 //
GP12brndp1_u:7674: yuge yuge bhavantyete sarve dakṣādayo dvijāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7675: punaścaiva nirudhyante vidvāṃstatra na muhyati // BndP_1,37.53 //
GP12brndp1_u:7678: imāṃ visṛṣṭiṃ yo veda cākṣuṣasya carācaram /
GP12brndp1_u:7681: ityete ṣaṭ nisargāśca krāntā manvantarātmakāḥ // BndP_1,37.56 //
GP12brndp1_u:7683: ete sargā yathā prājñaiḥ proktā ye dvijasattamāḥ // BndP_1,37.57 //
GP12brndp1_u:7689: samāsavyāsataḥ sargaṃ bruvato me nibodhata // BndP_1,37.60 //
GP12brndp1_u:7690: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde cākṣuṣasargavarṇanaṃ nāma saptatriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12brndp1_u:7695: ādityā vasavī rudrāḥ sādhyā viśve marudgaṇāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7698: sādhyāśya vasavo viśve dharmaputrāstrayo gaṇāḥ // BndP_1,38.3 //
GP12brndp1_u:7700: vaivasvateṃ'tare hyasminnitye te chandajā matāḥ // BndP_1,38.4 //
GP12brndp1_u:7702: evaṃ sargastu mārīco vijñeyaḥ sāṃprataḥ śubhaḥ // BndP_1,38.5 //
GP12brndp1_u:7704: atītānāgatā ye ca varttante sāṃprataṃ ca ye // BndP_1,38.6 //
GP12brndp1_u:7709: trailokye yāni sattvāni gatimanti dhruvāṇi ca /
GP12brndp1_u:7716: bhavyaṃ smṛtaṃ divaṃ hyetatteṣāṃ vakṣyāmi sādhanam // BndP_1,38.12 //
GP12brndp1_u:7724: bhavanāttu bhuvalloko niruttayā hi nirucyate // BndP_1,38.16 //
GP12brndp1_u:7726: utpanne tu tathā loke dvitīye brahmaṇā punaḥ // BndP_1,38.17 //
GP12brndp1_u:7728: anāgate bhavya ita śabda eṣa vibhāvyate // BndP_1,38.18 //
GP12brndp1_u:7730: bhūritīyaṃ smṛtā bhūmirantarikṣaṃ bhuvaḥ smṛtam // BndP_1,38.19 //
GP12brndp1_u:7731: divaṃ smṛtaṃ tathā bhavyaṃ tralokyasyaiṣa nirṇayaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7733: nātha ityeṣa dhāturvai dhātujñaiḥ pālane smṛtaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7737: manvantareṣu ye devā yajñabhājo bhavanti hi /
GP12brndp1_u:7739: mahimānaḥ smṛtā hyete devendrāṇāṃ tu sarvaśaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7740: devendrā guravo nāthā rājānaḥ pitaro hi te // BndP_1,38.24 //
GP12brndp1_u:7752: ikṣvākuśca nṛgaścaiva dhṛṣṭaḥ śaryātireba ca // BndP_1,38.30 //
GP12brndp1_u:7756: kīrtitā vai tathā hyete saptamaṃ caitadantaram // BndP_1,38.32 //
GP12brndp1_u:7757: ityeṣa ha mayā pādo dvitīyaḥ kathitodvijāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7758: vistareṇānupūrvyā ca bhūyaḥ kiṃ kathayāmyaham // BndP_1,38.33 //
GP12brndp1_u:7759: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde manvantaravarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭātriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
